title: Murder in Broad Daylight
description: In this Dateline classic, Rusty Sneiderman was a young entrepreneur whose world comes crashing down one morning with four gunshots. A fatal triangle is revealed: Was this a crime of passion? Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 16, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
